page.title: 03NEW ROMNEY THE TOWN HALL
page.content: OUTSIDE THE TOWN HALL IS A CANNON LEANING AGAINST THE WALL.JUST INSIDE ARE THE OLD STOCKS WITH FOUR HOLES SO THAT THE PERSON IN THE STOCKS CANNOT GET OUT.ON THE WALL IS A PICTURE OF WHINSTON CHURCHILL.UPSTAIRS IN THE OLD COURTROOM IS A BIG JUDGE'S CHAIR WHERE THE PRISONERS SAT WAITING FOR THE JUDGE TO DECIDE WHETHER THEY WERE GUILTY OR NOT.IN A CASE AT THE BACK THERE WAS A COSTUME OF THE BARON OF THE CINQUE PORTS.IT ALSO HAS A SWORD WITH A GOLD HANDLE IN THE CASE.IN THE MAYOR'S PARLOUR THERE IS A BOOKCASE FULL OF BOOKS AND A SHINY TABLE AND CHAIRS.HERE THE MAYOR ENTERTAINS GUESTS AND GIVES THEM TEA.IN THE DUNGEON THE WALLS ARE MADE OF WOOD AND PRISONERS HAVE SCRATCHED INITIALS ON THEM.HERE ARE SOME OF THEM CX BHB BWB AND FW.
